section.sentence: Bienvenue dans l'univers de la Poesie a 2 mi-mots, de sa police coupable, police de l'ombre et centrale police.
Cet univers a ete invente au debut des annees 2000 et continue d'etre developpe par Pierre Fourny, dans le cadre d'ALIS, compagnie de spectacles.
L'application La Separation est l'une des composantes d'un vaste projet melant art, developpement technologique, pedagogie et observations scientifiques.
"C'est l'arbre qui cache la foret" dirait Pierre Fourny.
Ce projet a ete initie en decembre 2012 par ALIS et Serge Bouchardon, fondateur du collectif d'auteurs numeriques I-Trace.
Mentions legales

Welcome to the cutting edge poetry's universe and its fonts.
This universe was designed by Pierre Fourny at the beginning of the 2000s.
It continues to be developed by him under a performance company named ALIS.
The Separation application is included in a larger project, that combines art, technology development, education and scientific observations.
"It is the tree that hides the forest" as Pierre Fourny would say.
The project started in December 2012 under the leadership of ALIS and Serge Bouchardon, teacher-researcher and I-Trace's founder, a group of digital authors.
